API¶

Libraries¶

  • woodruff
  • law
  • health

Date formats¶

  • YYYY-MM-DD

Total usage by library¶

/total_usage/<library>/<person type>/<start date>/<end date>/

Person Types:¶

  • all
  • student
  • faculty
  • staff

Filtered by:¶

  • Library
  • persn_c_type

Example output:¶

{
    data: [
        [
            1412164800000,
            5
        ],
        [
            1412164920000,
            1
        ],
        [
            1412164980000,
            1
        ],
        <..truncated..>
    ],
    meta: {
        strt_date: [
            "2014-10-01"
        ],
        end_date: [
            "2014-10-03"
        ],
        library: [
            "law"
        ],
        title: [
            ""
        ]
    },
    distinct: [
        "611"
    ],
    total: [
        "1411"
    ],
    queried_at: [
        "2014-10-16 20:48:28.167524"
    ]
}

Total students living on or off campus by library¶

/on_off_campus/<library>/<Y/N>/<start date>/<end date>/

Filtered by:¶

  • Library
  • stdn_f_cmps_on
  • prsn_c_type (students only)

Example output:¶

{
    data: [
        [
            1412168280000,
            1
        ],
        [
            1412168520000,
            1
        ],
        [
            1412170260000,
            1
        ],
        <...truncated...>
    ],
    meta: {
        strt_date: [
            "2014-10-01"
        ],
        end_date: [
            "2014-10-03"
        ],
        library: [
            "law"
        ],
        title: [
            ""
        ]
    },
    distinct: [
        "13"
    ],
    total: [
        "20"
    ],
    queried_at: [
        "2014-10-16 21:02:49.834051"
    ]
}

Totals by student classifications by library¶

/student_class/<library>/<stdn_e_clas>/<start date>/<end date>/

Filtered by:¶

  • Library
  • stdn_e_clas
  • prsn_c_type (students only)

Example output:¶

{
    data: [
        [
            1412136000000,
            1
        ],
        [
            1412136240000,
            1
        ],
        [
            1412137080000,
            1
        ],
        <..truncated..>
    ],
    meta: {
        strt_date: [
            "2014-10-01"
        ],
        end_date: [
            "2014-10-03"
        ],
        library: [
            "woodruff"
        ],
        title: [
            ""
        ]
    },
    distinct: [
        "558"
    ],
    total: [
        "859"
    ],
    queried_at: [
        "2014-10-17 09:47:40.256205"
    ]
}

Totals by faculty classifications by library¶

/faculty_staff_class/<library>/<dvsn_n>/<start date>/<end date>/

Filtered by:¶

  • Library
  • dvsn_n
  • prsn_c_type (faculty only)

Example output:¶

{
    data: [
        [
            1412172240000,
            1
        ],
        [
            1412176440000,
            1
        ]
    ],

        ],

            "2014-10-03"

            "woodruff"
        ],

            ""

        "1"
    ],
        total: [
        "2"
    ],
    queried_at: [
        "2014-10-17 10:08:47.299183"
        ]
}

Top Academic Plans¶

/top_academic_plan/<library>/<start date>/<end date>/

Filtered by:¶

  • Library
  • acpl_n
  • prsn_c_type (students only)

Example output:¶

{
    data: [
        {
            label: "Law",
            value: 27881
        },
        {
            label: "Business Administration",
            value: 327
        },
        {
            label: "Juridical Science",
            value: 247
        },
        <..truncated..>
    ],
    meta: {
        strt_date: [
            "2014-07-01"
        ],
        end_date: [
            "2014-10-30"
        ],
        library: [
            "law"
        ],
        title: [
            "Academic Plan"
        ]
    },
    distinct: [
        "53"
    ],
    total: [
        "30253"
    ],
    queried_at: [
        "2014-10-17 10:20:01.423390"
    ]
}

Top Departments¶

/top_dprtn/<library>/<start date>/<end date>/

Filtered by:¶

  • Library
  • dprt_n

Example output¶

{
    data: [
        {
            label: "LITS: Library IT Expense",
            value: 288
        },
        {
            label: "GBS: MBA Admissions",
            value: 191
        },
        {
            label: "ECAS: Academic Support",
            value: 154
        },
        <...truncated..>
    ],
    meta: {
        strt_date: [
            "2014-10-01"
        ],
        end_date: [
            "2014-10-03"
        ],
        library: [
            "woodruff"
        ],
        title: [
            "Department"
        ]
    },
    distinct: [
        "287"
    ],
    total: [
        "3585"
    ],
    queried_at: [
        "2014-10-17 11:00:19.795288"
    ]
}

Top Divisions¶

/top_division/<library>/<start date>/<end date>/

Filtered by:¶

  • Library
  • dvsn_n

Example output¶

{
    data: [
        {
            label: "LITS: Library and IT Services",
            value: 1133
        },
        {
            label: "Emory College",
            value: 714
        },
        {
            label: "Campus Life Activities",
            value: 421
        },
        <...truncated...>
    ],
    meta: {
        strt_date: [
            "2014-10-01"
        ],
        end_date: [
            "2014-10-03"
        ],
        library: [
            "woodruff"
        ],
        title: [
            "Faculty Division"
        ]
    },
    distinct: [
        "28"
    ],
    total: [
        "3585"
    ],
    queried_at: [
        "2014-10-17 10:57:03.188432"
    ]
}

Average by day, hour(s) and classification¶

/averages/<library>/<start date>/<end date>/<start hour>/<end hour>/<dow>/<filter>

  • Hours are 0 - 23
  • Days are ints with Sunday = 1...Saturday = 7

Filters:¶

  • stdn_e_clas (student_classes)
  • acpl_n (acidemic_plans)
  • dprt_n (departments)
  • acca_i (academic_career)
  • dvsn_n (faculty_divisions)

Example output¶

{
    data: {
        advanced-standing: {
            label: "Advanced Standing",
            value: 55
        },
        freshman: {
            label: "Freshman",
            value: 11
        },
        full-standing: {
            label: "Full Standing",
            value: 18
        },
        graduate: {
            label: "Graduate",
            value: 0
        },
        <..turncated..>
    },
    meta: {
        strt_date: [
            "2014-10-01"
        ],
        end_date: [
            "2014-10-03"
        ],
        strt_hour: [
            "13"
        ],
        end_hour: [
            "15"
        ],
        dow: [
            "Thursday"
        ],
        queried_at: [
            "2014-10-17 10:53:38.601905"
        ]
    }
}

Total Average by day and hour(s)¶

/total_averages/<library>/<start date>/<end date>/<start hour>/<end hour>/<dow> * Hours are 0 - 23 * Days are ints with Sunday = 1...Saturday = 7

Example output¶

{
    start_date: "2014-10-01",
    end_date: "2014-10-02",
    start_hour: "13",
    end_hour: "15",
    dow: "5",
    data: {
        average: "912"
    }
}

Classifications¶

/classifications

  • student_classes = stdn_e_clas
  • acidemic_plans = acpl_n
  • departments = dprt_n
  • academic_career = acca_i
  • faculty_divisions = dvsn_n

Example output¶

{
    student_classes: [
        "Advanced Standing",
        "Freshman",
        "Full Standing",
        <..truncated..>
    ],
    academic_plans: [
        "Acute Care",
        "Adult Certificate",
        "Adult-Gerontology NP",
        <...truncated..>
    ],
    academic_career: [
        "GAH",
        "GBUS",
        "GNUR",
        <...truncated..>
    ],
    faculty_divisions: [
        "Affiliated",
        "Campus Lif",
        "Campus Life Activities",
        <...truncated..>
    ],
    departments: [
        "Ala Longstreet Means",
        "Alpha Epsilon Pi Fraternity Ac",
        "Alpha Epxilan Phi",
        <...truncated..>
    ]
}
